text: Darlington is a town in County Durham, England. Darlington had population of 97,838 in 1997.Census 2001 - Population Pyramids - Darlington UA The town is on the East Coast mainline and has from many intercity rail dervices, including routes to London, Newcastle upon Tyne, Edinburgh, Leeds and Manchester. The towns is well known for its football team, Darlington F.C.. The Darlington Economic Campus has officials from nine government departments. It is part of the governmentâ€™s plan to move 22,000 civil service jobs out of London. ==References== Category:Towns in County Durham
title: Darlington
